  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Add
The Add class represents a command that creates a new object and adds it to the collection.
AveregeOfDistance
The AveregeOfDistance class represents a command that calculates the average distance by summing over all Route objects in the collection.
Clear
The Clear command class that clears the collection.
ColectionManager
Manages a collection of Route objects, providing methods to add, update, remove, save, and retrieve routes by their ID.
Command
An abstract command with a name and description.
CommandManager
Manages command objects and their execution history.
ConsoleQuest
Provides console-based prompts (questions) to create and populate Route, Coordinates, and Location objects.
Coordinates
The Coordinates class represents a pair of (x, y) coordinates.
CountByDistance
The CountByDistance class extends the Command class and counts how many routes have a specified distance.
ExecuteScript
The ExecuteScript class extends Command and reads commands from a specified file, executing them through the provided CommandManager.
Exit
The Exit command class extends Command and terminates the program upon execution.
Head
The Head class extends the abstract Command class and prints the first element of the collection.
Help
The Help class extends the Command class and provides functionality to display help information about all available commands.
Info
The Info command class extends the Command class and displays information about the collection managed by the provided ColectionManager.
Location
The Location class represents a geographical location with x and y coordinates and a name.
Main
 
PrintAscending
The PrintAscending class extends the Command class and prints all routes from the collection in ascending order.
RemoveById
The RemoveById command extends the Command class to remove an object from the collection by its unique identifier.
RemoveHead
The RemoveHead command removes the first element from the collection.
RemoveLower
Command to remove all elements from the collection that are considered lower than a specified element.
Route
The Route class represents a route with various attributes such as id, name, coordinates, creation date, starting and ending locations, and distance.
RouteXMLScaner
The RouteXMLScaner class parses an XML file to extract Route objects.
RouteXMLWriter
The RouteXMLWriter class writes Route objects to an XML file.
Runner
Initializes and manages the application's main components: ColectionManager for storing and manipulating routes. CommandManager for registering and retrieving command objects. RouteXMLScaner and RouteXMLWriter for reading/writing route data.
Save
Command to save data to an XML file.
Show
Command to display all Route objects from the collection.
Update
Command to update an element in the collection.
Validate
